core_interfaces.name: Orchestrator
core_interfaces.role: Central hub for service integration and agent management.

core_interfaces.name: Agent
core_interfaces.role: Autonomous entity responsible for executing tasks using a specific LLM context or Neuron model.

core_interfaces.name: Task
core_interfaces.role: Unit of work within an orchestration, support sub-tasks and sequential execution.

core_interfaces.name: NeuronAI
core_interfaces.role: Integration point for specialized neural networks (CNN, RNN, etc.).

extension_points.description: Allows custom content to be displayed in the Project Explorer and Evo Navigator.
Marker nature for AI Evolution projects.
